### Mob System Development
- [0xpeezy] is working on mobs with weapons, animations, and damage tied to weapon scripts.
- [ashxn.eth] suggests a general-purpose mob app with modular behavior (melee vs. ranged).
- Client crashes occur with 10+ mob clones, possibly due to raycasting issues.
- Solution: [ashxn.eth] proposes using a **rigidbody + collider** system with a `mob:1` tag for hit detection.

### Waypoint System for Racing
- [valiantxxx] requests waypoints for race tracking and spectator features.
- [0mka_] agrees and starts implementation, adding **proximity triggers** to gate models.

### UI Overhaul
- [ashxn.eth] deploys a new **world menu UI** for better control.
- Issues: Missing **nodes/hierarchy section**, entity modification errors.
- Fixes: [ashxn.eth] patches entity modification issues and refines UI layout.

### Collision & Physics Issues
- [.somethingmoreprofessional] struggles with **collider misalignment** in Blender exports.
- [nightshiffty] points out missing **custom props** checkbox in Blender export.
- [ashxn.eth] explains **convex vs. concave colliders**, resolving unexpected collision behavior.

### Documentation Gaps
- [mattimus] struggles with **lack of structured documentation** for core objects.
- [.somethingmoreprofessional] suggests a **project structure guide**.
- [lastraum] proposes prioritizing **v1 documentation** before adding new features.

### Git & GitHub Tutorial
- A session was held covering Git and GitHub basics.
- Future sessions will focus on **Architectural 3D design** and **Optimization**.

### Hyperfy Development Status
- [ashxn.eth] confirmed he is the **main developer** and that the project has **years of financial runway**.
- [jing0] asked about hiring more developers. [d_maximus] responded that while many developers are contributing, a **product/marketing manager** could help with execution.

### Collision Import Issues
- [miahigashikata] asked about importing 3D models with collisions.
- [ashxn.eth] confirmed that the app allows enabling collisions but noted that KTX/Draco textures are not supported yet.
- [miahigashikata] tested on the dev branch and confirmed it works.

### Animation Import to Blender
- [.somethingmoreprofessional] encountered an issue where animations imported as a "giant iconosphere."
- Realized the issue was due to downloading GLBs that were actually VRMs.
- Solution: Download animations from [hyperfy-animations.vercel.app](https://hyperfy-animations.vercel.app/), import as VRMs, delete hip transforms (X, Y, Z), and apply them to WASD keys while keeping player movement.

### Hyperfy Tools Rotation Issue
- [.somethingmoreprofessional] reported that Hyperfy Tools rotates models 90 degrees unnecessarily.
- [0mka_] explained this was a previous fix for backward imports, which may no longer be needed.
- Suggested providing feedback to [@161613961605677058].
